attributes.action: Theresa May to resign as Prime Minister.
attributes.additional_details: For not standing by a legal binding referendum in which the nation voted to leave the European Unions as pledged.  Instead the Prime Minister has backtracked.
attributes.background: Due to multiple Brexit Negotiations failures and for the Security of the United Kingdom. Theresa May must resign as Prime Minister immediately.

rejection.details: The resignation of an MP and/or Minister would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
